strings.Value: "Let's trade. You give me things, and I'll give you money."

{n}An unusual kobold stands before you, decorated with bits of trash from horns to tail. He's wearing a necklace of metal shards, patches of cloth and bones, and his wrists are covered with bracelets made of wire, bone, and splinters of wood.{/n}

{n}Near the kobold you see backpacks, seemingly snatched from travelers unlucky enough to become a troll's lunch. Each backpack is stuffed with a variety of goods â€” weapons, armor pieces, and potion bottles. The kobold notices your gaze and tilts his head, as if asking a question about his "treasures."{/n}
{n}The kobold tilts his head again and opens his sharp-toothed mouth. You're not certain what it means, but it seems like the reptile is satisfied with your compliment.{/n}
{n}The kobold trader glances at you occasionally as he rummages through his collection of trophies.{/n}
